channel.title: Random Games on MiniGameFun
channel.description: Recent content in Random Games on MiniGameFun

item.title: Get 13 Puzzle
item.description:
Achieve victory by reaching the target value of 13. The core mechanism is straightforward: combine numerical blocks of identical value to iteratively increment the total until the designated goal of 13 is successfully attained. Have you already optimized your score??Achieve victory by reaching the target value of 13. The core mechanism is straightforward: combine numerical blocks of identical value to iteratively increment the total until the designated goal of 13 is successfully attained. Have you already optimized your score?

Instructions

Tap on Block to Merge blocks with the same number to increase by 1?Tap on Block to Merge blocks with the same number to increase by 1

item.title: Relaxing Games
item.description:
Experience the Relaxing Games collection, offering a curated suite of casual, engaging mini-games optimized for leisure periods. This diverse portfolio includes various genres—from straightforward puzzle mechanics and simulation exercises to accessible shooting challenges and elimination formats—facilitating seamless transitions for user immersion.?Experience the Relaxing Games collection, offering a curated suite of casual, engaging mini-games optimized for leisure periods. This diverse portfolio includes various genres—from straightforward puzzle mechanics and simulation exercises to accessible shooting challenges and elimination formats—facilitating seamless transitions for user immersion.

Instructions

Mouse click or tap to play?Mouse click or tap to play
